_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Velocity
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Velocity is a Minecraft server proxy with unparalleled server support, scalability, and flexibility.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Velocity Proxy Installation Script
# Server Files: /mnt/server

PROJECT=velocity
API_URL="https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}"

cd /mnt/server

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g'))
else
    # 1. Get version
    if [ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ] || [ "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
        echo -e "Fetching latest version from PaperMC API..."
        VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -sSL ${API_URL} | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
    fi
    echo -e "Using version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"

    # 2. Get latest build ID (API returns an array of numbers)
    echo -e "Fetching latest build ID for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}..."
    BUILD_ID=$(curl -sSL ${API_URL}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
    
    if [ "${BUILD_ID}" == "null" ] || [ -z "${BUILD_ID}" ]; then
        echo -e "Error: Could not find any builds for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}."
        exit 1
    fi
    echo -e "Latest build ID is: ${BUILD_ID}"

    # 3. Get build details to resolve the filename
    echo -e "Fetching build details..."
    BUILD_DETAILS=$(curl -sSL ${API_URL}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_ID})
    JAR_NAME=$(echo ${BUILD_DETAILS} | jq -r '.downloads.application.name')

    echo -e "Jar name is: ${JAR_NAME}"

    DOWNLOAD_URL="${API_URL}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_ID}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}"
fi

# Download
if [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]; then
    mv "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
fi

echo -e "Downloading velocity from: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -L -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

# Default config
if [ ! -f velocity.toml ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading default velocity.toml..."
    curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml -o velocity.toml
fi

# Forwarding secret
if [ ! -f forwarding.secret ]; then
    echo -e "Generating forwarding.secret..."
    touch forwarding.secret
    cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 12 | head -n 1 > forwarding.secret
fi

echo -e "Install complete"

variables.name: Velocity Version
variables.description:
The Velocity Proxy version to download.

Set to 'latest ' the download the last stable build.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'velocity.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the velocity release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
